betterquesting:10.desc:8:
A pickaxe that never breaks, featuring three modes:

Block Mode (Green): It mines normally, like a standard pickaxe.

Square Mode (Red): It will mine a 5x5 area around the initial block.

Linear Mode (Blue): It will mine 10 blocks in the direction of destruction.

When used in the Overworld bedrock layer, the Awakened Ichorium Pickaxe will directly mine bedrock and create a Bedrock Portal. Entering this portal will transport you to the Bedrock World.
